# Special Protocols

FTP protocol [1].

File protocol [2].

Mailto protocol [3].

Tel protocol [4].

Data URI [5].

JavaScript URI [6].

Magnet link [7].

Custom protocol [8].
<!-- mdcitefix:refs -->
[1]: ftp://ftp.example.com/file.txt
[2]: file:///home/user/document.pdf
[3]: mailto:user@example.com?subject=Hello
[4]: tel:+1-555-123-4567
[5]: data:text/plain;base64,SGVsbG8gV29ybGQ=
[6]: javascript:alert('Hello')
[7]: magnet:?xt=urn:btih:1234567890abcdef
[8]: custom-protocol://some-resource
